DOC.brief_summary: Few patients who have major risk factors develop Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome (ARDS). The heritable determinants might be the reason. The multicenter study is to investigate the association between ARDS and polymorphism in ARDS gene r.
DOC.detailed_description: Few patients who have major risk factors develop ARDS. The heritable determinants might be the reason. The multicenter study is to investigate the association between ARDS and polymorphism in ARDS gene. Meanwhile, the association between ARDS and different methods of therapy.
DOC.criteria: ARDS patients in Han nationality Age < 18 yearold
